task.title: Enabling data collection using the Data Collector Configuration utility

context.p: To enable data collection using the Data Collector Configuration utility, complete the following steps:

step.cmd: Run the Data Collector Configuration utility (see Running the Data Collector Configuration utility):

ol.li: Select the DataPower Appliance runtime environment.
Select the Configure > DataPower Instance option.
Select the option to enable data collection.
The default DataPower port number (5500) and the default polling interval (10 seconds) are provided. Accept these defaults or specify different values.
Verify that the DataPower Path is set to /.You cannot specify a path other than /. Changing its value has no effect.
Optionally specify the DataPower Display Group.
Wait for the configuration utility to complete the operation.

info.note: When you deploy the DataPower data collector, you must start the data collector once you have enabled it to begin collecting data. For more information about starting the data collector, see Starting and stopping the data collector.
